title: Derivative
extendedDescription: A simple web application created to provide an easy way to calculate derivatives using numerical methods. It was developed using only HTML, CSS and JS.

features.name: Derivative Calculation
features.description: Numerical derivative computation using limit definition with precision control.

features.name: User Interface
features.description: Intuitive input system for function and parameter entry.

features.name: Keyboard Support
features.description: Enhanced navigation with keyboard shortcuts and Enter key submission.
